Class JunaioPlugin.Settings

java.lang.Object
  com.metaio.junaio.plugin.JunaioPlugin.Settings
Enclosing class:
JunaioPlugin
public static final class JunaioPlugin.Settings
extends java.lang.Object

Set advanced settings such as enable/disable cache, override GPS location, change camera preview resolution etc.

          Set camera preview resolution height.

          Display distances in imperial units

Field Detail

enableErrorLog

public static boolean enableErrorLog
Enable or disable error messages. Default is false

disableCache

public static boolean disableCache
Enable or disable cache. Default is false

overrideLocation

public static com.metaio.sdk.jni.LLACoordinate overrideLocation
Set a manual location, the location from GPS sensor will not be used if set. To use GPS sensor, this should be null which is the default.

cameraWidth

public static int cameraWidth
Set camera preview resolution width. This is only a requested resolution, the final preview resolution depends on the device.

cameraHeight

public static int cameraHeight
Set camera preview resolution height. This is only a requested resolution, the final preview resolution depends on the device.

useImperialUnits

public static boolean useImperialUnits
Display distances in imperial units

reset

public static void reset()
Reset all the settings to default values
